scripts.start:db: docker stop todos-apollo-mongo 2> /dev/null|| true && docker rm todos-apollo-mongo 2> /dev/null || true && docker run -p 27017:27017 --name todos-apollo-mongo -d mongo
scripts.start:todo-lists-microservice: wait-on tcp:27017 && cd microservice-todo-lists && ./gradlew clean bootRun
scripts.start:todo-items-microservice: wait-on tcp:27017 && cd microservice-todo-items && ./gradlew clean bootRun
scripts.start:todo-lists-graph: wait-on tcp:8090 && cd graphql-todo-lists && npm run start
scripts.start:todo-items-graph: wait-on tcp:8091 && cd graphql-todo-items && npm run start
scripts.start:gateway: wait-on tcp:4001 && wait-on tcp:4002 && cd rover && npm run start:local
scripts.start:web: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:4000 && cd web && npm run start

hooks.pre-commit: npm run type-check && npm run precommit:todo-lists-graph && npm run precommit:todo-items-graph
